name: Fractal Flyers
description:
Thanks for checking out my game Fractal Flyers. This game came from my own burning desire to powerloop a serpinsky triangle. It was so cool, I couldn't keep it to myself.  So now you too can power-loop and matty-filp abstract geometry from another dimension to your hearts content!  

The fractal rendering is quite intensive on the computers CPU.  Therefore, your GPU will have little effect on the performance. If the project gains enough support, I will make a version with GPU acceleration.

Recommended Specs: i7, 980m, 8gb ram

CONTROLLER REQUIRED!!!

This game is a FPV drone simulator and requires a radio or controller to play. Any radio running open TX will work as long as you have at least two switches set up along with your gimbals.

If you have questions or feedback I'd love to hear them!
Discord: https://discord.gg/zH7dxQ2xQr
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCe0qszyJuI_xhBuL0XQKTPQ
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/guthixx520/
